name: Psychiatric
metaTitle: Psychiatric VA Resource Hub | Virtual Minds
metaDescription: Specialized administrative support for psychiatrists. Appointment scheduling, prior authorizations, and billing correspondence support.
heroDescription: Reduce administrative burden. We handle scheduling, prior authorizations, and intake coordination so you can focus on patient care.

resources.title: Streamlining Prior Authorizations
resources.description: How we manage pharmacy communications and paperwork to ensure your patients get their medication on time.

resources.title: Superbill Generation Made Easy
resources.description: We generate superbills, process credit card transactions, and contact insurance companies on request, working alongside your billing company.

resources.title: EHR Implementation Support
resources.description: Need to set up a new EHR? We review current plans and assist with implementation and office set-up.

name: Private Practice
metaTitle: Private Practice Operations Support | Virtual Minds
metaDescription: Consulting and admin support for starting your private practice. Contract review, office set-up, and patient communication.
heroDescription: Launching a private practice? We provide the start-up services you need, from office set-up to policy creation.

resources.title: Reviewing Current Processes
resources.description: We analyze your current systems and make recommendations for new procedures to improve efficiency.

resources.title: Client Intake & Onboarding
resources.description: Create a seamless client management experience with our structured intake policies.

name: ADHD Clinic
metaTitle: ADHD Clinic Admin Support | Virtual Minds
metaDescription: Specialized support for ADHD clinics. Prior authorizations, calendar management, and patient correspondence.
heroDescription: Focus on treatment. We handle the intense volume of prior authorizations and scheduling changes common in ADHD clinics.

resources.title: Managing Prescription Prior Auths
resources.description: We tirelessly contact insurance companies on request to resolve authorization issues for stimulants.

resources.title: Telehealth Support Services
resources.description: Ensuring your telehealth sessions run smoothly with technical support and patient follow-up.

name: Nurse Practitioner
metaDescription: Contract review, HIPAA compliance support, and administrative assistance specifically for PMHNPs.
heroDescription: Starting solo? We review contracts, help with HIPAA compliance, and manage your billing correspondence.

resources.title: Contract Review & Negotiation
resources.description: Expert assistance in reviewing contracts and ensuring your practice is set up for success.

name: DrChrono Practice
metaTitle: Virtual Assistants for DrChrono | Virtual Minds California
metaDescription: Specialized VAs who know DrChrono. We handle templates, billing correspondence support, and OnPatient portal messages.
heroDescription: Stop training VAs on DrChrono from scratch. Our assistants are Day-1 proficient in iPad check-ins and custom templates.

resources.title: Optimizing DrChrono Templates
resources.description: How we build custom clinical templates to speed up your note-taking by 30%.

name: CharmHealth Practice
metaTitle: Virtual Assistants for CharmHealth | Virtual Minds California
metaDescription: CharmHealth experts. We manage questionnaires, sketch pads, and patient portal communication for CA psychiatrists.
heroDescription: Maximize CharmHealth's potential. We handle the questionnaires and patient portal so you can focus on clinical work.

resources.title: CharmHealth Questionnaire Setup
resources.description: Automating your intake through CharmHealth's patient kiosk and portal features.
